security_audit.summary: This is a documentation generation skill with no executable code, network calls, or file system access beyond reading template files. It provides structured guidance for creating component documentation.

content.value_statement: Creating comprehensive documentation for UI components is time-consuming and often incomplete. This skill automates the entire documentation process for FlowGram material components, including Story creation, API documentation, and multi-language support.
actual_capabilities: Generates complete component documentation from source code
Creates Story components with proper lazy loading and TypeScript
Provides structured templates for consistent documentation format
Analyzes component props, dependencies, and implementation details
limitations: Only works with FlowGram material components
Cannot generate actual component code, only documentation
Needs existing component source to analyze

use_cases.title: Document new components
use_cases.description: Generate comprehensive documentation for newly created FlowGram material components with API tables and usage examples.

use_cases.title: Standardize documentation
use_cases.description: Ensure all team components follow consistent documentation patterns with proper Story examples and API references.

use_cases.title: Translate component docs
use_cases.description: Efficiently create bilingual documentation for international teams with proper terminology consistency.

prompt_templates.title: Create new component docs
prompt_templates.scenario: Documenting a newly created FlowGram component
prompt_templates.prompt: I need to create documentation for a new FlowGram material component called 'data-table'. Please help me generate the complete documentation including Story components, API reference, and code examples.

prompt_templates.title: Add Story examples
prompt_templates.scenario: Adding multiple usage examples to existing docs
prompt_templates.prompt: I have a FlowGram component 'variable-selector' that needs documentation with 3 Story examples: basic usage, with filtering, and disabled state. Can you create the Story components and documentation?

prompt_templates.title: Translate documentation
prompt_templates.prompt: I have approved Chinese documentation for 'dynamic-input' component at apps/docs/src/zh/materials/components/dynamic-input.mdx. Please translate it to English maintaining all code examples and API tables.

prompt_templates.title: Update existing docs
prompt_templates.prompt: The 'form-validator' component documentation is outdated. The source code has new props and dependencies. Please analyze the current implementation and update the documentation with the latest API changes.

output_examples.input: Create documentation for a FlowGram component that displays variable selectors with schema filtering
output: Complete MDX documentation file with component overview
Story components for BasicStory, WithSchemaStory, and DisabledStory
API reference table with all props, types, and descriptions
Source code analysis section with dependency mapping
Usage examples with proper code formatting

best_practices: Always confirm the Chinese documentation is complete and accurate before translating to English
Use React.lazy for Story components to avoid performance issues
Include comprehensive API tables with all public props and their types
Add Mermaid diagrams to visualize component workflows and data flow
anti_patterns: Do not translate code examples, commands, or file paths in documentation
Avoid mixing Chinese and English in the same documentation section
Never skip the Story component creation step as it's essential for interactive examples
Do not create documentation without analyzing the actual source code implementation

faq.question: Which FlowGram components can this skill document?
faq.answer: This skill works with any material component in the FlowGram framework, specifically those located in packages/materials/form-materials/src/components.

faq.question: How does the skill handle component dependencies?
faq.answer: The skill analyzes import statements, Hook usage, and package.json to create a comprehensive dependency map including FlowGram APIs, other materials, and third-party libraries.

faq.question: Can I customize the documentation template?
faq.answer: The skill uses a standardized template at templates/material.mdx that ensures consistency across all component documentation. Customization would require modifying the template file.

faq.question: What happens if the component source code changes?
faq.answer: The skill analyzes the current source code each time, so documentation will reflect the latest implementation including new props, dependencies, or functionality changes.

faq.question: How are Story components different from regular examples?
faq.answer: Story components are interactive demonstrations wrapped in FreeFormMetaStoryBuilder with proper lazy loading, TypeScript types, and integration with FlowGram's form system.

faq.question: Does the skill support components with complex state management?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill can document components using Hooks, Context, and other state patterns by analyzing the implementation and explaining the architecture in the documentation.
